title: Ticket #7418: Add GOMAXPROCS to STARTER_NUM_THREADS_ENV_VARS
description:
We should add "GOMAXPROCS" to the list of environment variables we set to control number of threads. GOMAXPROCS controls the number of threads for Go code.

See this stackoverflow answer: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39245660/number-of-threads-used-by-go-runtime

(Note that this is only the number of threads for user code; the Go runtime may use additional ones. Not perfect but better than nothing.)
